00032 extern "C" {
00033 #include <errno.h>
00034 }
00035 
00036 #include "Logger.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 namespace Hypertable {
00040 
00041   class TestHarness {
00042   public:
00043     TestHarness(const char *name) {
00044 
00045       m_name = name;
00046 
00047       Logger::initialize(name);
00048 
00049       // open temporary output file
00050       sprintf(m_output_file, "%s%d", name, getpid());
00051 
00052       if ((m_fd = open(m_output_file, O_CREAT | O_TRUNC | O_WRONLY, 0644))
00053           < 0) {
00054         HT_ERRORF("open(%s) failed - %s", m_output_file, strerror(errno));
00055         exit(1);
00056       }
00057 
00058       Logger::set_test_mode(name, m_fd);
00059 
00060     }
00061     ~TestHarness() {
00062       unlink(m_output_file);
00063     }
00064 
00065     int get_log_file_descriptor() { return m_fd; }
00066 
00067     void validate_and_exit(const char *golden_file) {
00068       close(m_fd);
00069       int exitval = 0;
00070       String command = (String)"diff " + m_output_file + " " + golden_file;
00071       if (system(command.c_str()))
00072         exitval = 1;
00073       if (exitval == 0)
00074         unlink(m_output_file);
00075       else
00076         std::cerr << "Diff Error:  " << command << std::endl;
00077       exit(exitval);
00078     }
00079 
00080     void regenerate_golden_file(const char *golden_file) {
00081       String command = (String)"cp " + m_output_file + " " + golden_file;
00082       system(command.c_str());
00083     }
00084 
00085     void clear_output() {
00086       if (!m_appender->reopen()) {
00087         HT_ERRORF("Problem re-opening logging output file %s", m_output_file);
00088         display_error_and_exit();
00089       }
00090     }
00091 
00092     void display_error_and_exit() {
00093       close(m_fd);
00094       std::cerr << "Error, see '" << m_output_file << "'" << std::endl;
00095       /*
00096       string command = (string)"cat " + m_output_file;
00097       system(command.c_str());
00098       unlink(m_output_file);
00099       */
00100       exit(1);
00101     }
00102 
00103   private:
00104     char m_output_file[128];
00105     log4cpp::FileAppender *m_appender;
00106     const char *m_name;
00107     int m_fd;
00108   };
00109 
00110 }
